rules_text:
When this creature enters, it connives. [i](Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end, if you discarded two or more cards this turn, create a 2/2 blue Jellyfish creature token with “When this creature enters, return target creature to its owner's hand.”
